text: Ia igiamra itir dughiam, a ruarazir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, bizir osɨmtɨziba ia ganɨdiba, ia puv dagh nɨghnɨghan markɨ. Egh ia, bizir mɨzazir ian mɨkarzibagh anɨdibar gɨntɨghan markɨ. Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn fo, ia igiamɨn itir ikɨrɨmɨrim uaghan, mati an mɨngariba mongezɨ e dagh fozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi.
